nodes.text: Nillika was a Human male that lived during the Galactic Civil War. He worked as an administrator in Mos Eisley on Tatooine.

In 1 ABY many people were caught in a firefight between between Lady Valarian's guards and Jabba the Hutt's thugs in Mos Eisley. The 2-1B droid Billingsly sent a spacer to Mos Eisley to help the local medical staff. The droid also sent the medic's profile and payment to Nillika. After the medic had treated the injuries of Escara Frei and Jorund Redd, Nillika handed out 5000 credits and a field surgeon ring to the medic.

Administrator Nillika is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies who can be found outside of the medical center in Mos Eisley. He is part of the low-level quest Caught in the Crossfire for players of the Medic profession. After the player has treated Escara Frei and Jorund Redd, Billingsly sents the player to Nillika to receive the rewards. In this message, the NPC is erroneously called "Nillka".
It is unclear whether Nillika worked as an administrator of the medical center or for the local authorities.
